Description.Text: The “Excelixi” Conference Center with its multifunctional infrastructure and its specialized staff, ensures the success of professional meetings, training sessions, scientific conferences and any other corporate event of national or international spectrum. • A modern amphitheater with built-in simultaneous interpretation booths and a seating capacity of 196 • A naturally lighted, multi-functional conference hall with high-tech • Audiovisual equipment hosting up to 550 people • 16 rooms for workshops seating up to 50 persons • 4 computer rooms seating up to 33 persons • Comfortable indoor halls and outdoor • Recreational space • Business center • Library • Technical support • Free Wi-Fi

Domotel Kastri is a city hotel in Athens and one of the most recent members of the Domotel luxury hotel-chain. The hotel is located at the Kastri district of Nea Erythrea, close enough to the center of Athens and just few steps away from the shopping center of Kifissia. The premium and sufficient roadway network along with the nearby public transportation, connects Domotel Kastri directly to the major points of interest of the city of Athens. The hotel and its training & conference centre are built in a vast area of 15000 sqm that will include carefully made gardens, functional public areas and 4 acres of pinewood

The hotel’s main restaurant offers a daily breakfast buffet enriched with traditional Greek flavors, whereas the all-day bistro with views to the hotel’s stunning gardens, presents a menu of Mediterranean cuisine based on organic fresh products. Drinks and snacks can also be enjoyed on the terrace all year around. A modern, premium bar offering a variety of beverages, fabulous cocktails as well as a wide selection of wines, is the ideal spot to relax and escape the daily routine.
This accommodation has a small lobby.
